nodes.text: The Dahvil-Fodro Hyperspace Promenade was an illegal starship race that was part of the Star Rally and was held in the Rayter sector during the Galactic Civil War. Racers began on the planet Dahvil and then traveled to Ord Dorlass, Tintel and Azna, before finishing on Fodro. The race was organized by Pann Tefilous and racers included the Human Siro Simito and the Rodian Seeg. Despite its illegal nature, it was very popular and the racers became rich and famous.
